channel.title: Instagram on IntangibleMatter
channel.description: Recent content in Instagram on IntangibleMatter

item.title: Antisocial Media
item.description: Social media sucks. Wow, groundbreaking opinion, right? Seriously, though. The kinds of platforms which the entire modern internet are based on are horrible in so many ways. There’s the fact they’re designed to addict, the way they’re used to spy on people, and just the general horrible way data gets treated by these platforms. I have, unless stated otherwise, used all of the following platforms.
